response.job_title: President of IAH Colombian Chapter | Hydrogeologist | FEFLOW Consultant | Groundwater Modeler at DHI
response.summary: Luis Camilo Suescún is a Civil engineer with an MSc in Water Resources of the National University of Colombia. As an academic, He has a Laureate distinction to developing and coupling computational tools for inverse modeling to quantify seepage flows in tunnels and awards by IAH, SPE and Elite Consulting SAC as speaker in international conferences and for his volunteer work in groundwater. Currently, Luis is the President ACH and IAH-Colombian chapter and he’s working as Hydrogeologist - Numerical Modeler with DHI Peru. He has experience to perform hydrogeological studies, geophysical-geological characterization, conceptual models, and advanced numerical modeling for groundwater supply, oil, mining and underground works in Latin America.
response.skills: AutoCAD, Matlab, HEC-RAS, HEC-HMS, MODFLOW, ArcGIS, SWMM, Hidrogeología, Feflow, R, Project Planning, Microsoft Office, AASHTO, SCE-UA, GLUE, PEST, Gestión del agua, Planeamiento de proyectos, Gestión de aguas pluviales, R (lenguaje de programación)

company.name: DHI
company.description:
DHI are the first people you should call when you have a tough challenge to solve in a water environment – be it a river, a reservoir, an ocean, a coastline, within a city or a factory. 

We develop tailor-made solutions for your water challenges using MIKE Powered by DHI technologies.  Whether you need software solutions or access to online services, our flexible technologies work seamlessly together for the best user experience.

Our knowledge of water environments is second-to-none. It represents over 50 years of dedicated research and real-life experience from more than 140 countries. With our skills development and capacity building activities through THE ACADEMY by DHI, we make sure you’re equipped to find and apply the appropriate solutions to your unique challenges.
